Text.val: @Author: Andreas Sedlmeier (AS)
@CREATED: 09-SEP-2005
12.11.2013 SH SCR18382 Physical department is now fetched from database also for processing FLA002
28.10.2013 SH SCR18382 Added message "No document exists to display" if no document exists for FLA002.exe.
11.09.2013 SH SCR18382 Fixed a bug where FLA002 is called
29.08.2013 SH SCR18382 Added pi.invo_no and implemented calling fla002.exe to activate the viewer
if pi.invo_no > 0
31.01.2013 AS SCR#17921 added support for SD1/SD2 files (XML reports)
09.11.2011 AS SCR#16887 if PDF we add new parameter invoiceno as
search criteria on command line
18.08.2009 AS SCR#14821 consolidated mgtools functions to mging.dll
12.08.2009 AS SCR#10023 intoduced error messages from sys_messages
05.03.2009 AS SCR#14460 enabled handling like NL for RO as well
10.10.2007 SH Fixed parameter mismatch "Radiant program FLR001"
07-SEP-2007 AS Surpress error if no file comes back from FLR001 and error=0
(user might have simply cancelled selection screen)
- SCR#11994 QV Plus parameters are stored in table
01-DEC-2006 AS added new parameter Radiant.FLR001(base-64 encode/decode)
15-DEC-2005 AS SCR#9784 calling quick view plus if GNRL_CODE=NL
Retrieves document from Radiant database and displays it
... archived file found, continue
... activate viewer via fla002.exe
... message "No document exists to display"
retrieve document and display error messages (if any) ...
document received. Display ...
for pdf we use acrobat reader, for everything else quick view ....
SD1/SD2 reports are zipped XML files which we want to open with Excel ....
SCR#16887 if PDF, we add invoice number as search info
Parameters ....
extract file extension ....
if we do not have a file extension, we peek into first 5 Bytes to check if its a
ODF file stored without an extension
Overwrite in case of debug settings available ...
retrieve document from archive and do the error handling ...
error occured, display proper message ...
Radiant error (warning) #5: Document not found in archive ...
Problems with webservice call to radiant ...
problems with webservice call ...
invalid department specified for search request ..
unspecified error ..
no error occured ...
SD1/SD2 files are zipped XML files. We do unzip these
Extract content of zip file to a temporary directory
The temporary directory should now contain the extracted file ...
Zipfile no longer needed, can be deleted ....
The first file in the temp. directory is our unzipped SD1/SD2 report ...
